bioconda.name: bioconductor-ggtree
bioconda.summary: an R package for visualization of tree and annotation data

biotools.summary: Extend the 'ggplot2' plotting system which implemented the grammar of graphics. It is designed for visualization and annotation of phylogenetic trees with their covariates and other associated data.

bioschemas.name: ggtree
bioschemas.summary: Extend the 'ggplot2' plotting system which implemented the grammar of graphics. It is designed for visualization and annotation of phylogenetic trees with their covariates and other associated data.
